systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the lab plan.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

provisioningState.Description: Current provisioning state of the lab plan.

defaultConnectionProfile.Description: The default lab connection profile. This can be changed on a lab resource and only provides a default profile.

defaultAutoShutdownProfile.Description: The default lab shutdown profile. This can be changed on a lab resource and only provides a default profile.

defaultNetworkProfile.Description: The lab plan network profile. To enforce lab network policies they must be defined here and cannot be changed when there are existing labs associated with this lab plan.

allowedRegions.Description: The allowed regions for the lab creator to use when creating labs using this lab plan.

sharedGalleryId.Description: Resource ID of the Shared Image Gallery attached to this lab plan. When saving a lab template virtual machine image it will be persisted in this gallery. Shared images from the gallery can be made available to use when creating new labs.

supportInfo.Description: Support contact information and instructions for users of the lab plan. This information is displayed to lab owners and virtual machine users for all labs in the lab plan.

linkedLmsInstance.Description: Base Url of the lms instance this lab plan can link lab rosters against.

webSshAccess.Description: The enabled access level for Web Access over SSH.

webRdpAccess.Description: The enabled access level for Web Access over RDP.

clientSshAccess.Description: The enabled access level for Client Access over SSH.

clientRdpAccess.Description: The enabled access level for Client Access over RDP.

shutdownOnDisconnect.Description: Whether shutdown on disconnect is enabled

shutdownWhenNotConnected.Description: Whether a VM will get shutdown when it hasn't been connected to after a period of time.

shutdownOnIdle.Description: Whether a VM will get shutdown when it has idled for a period of time.

disconnectDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will stay running after a user disconnects if this behavior is enabled.

noConnectDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will stay running before it is shutdown if no connection is made and this behavior is enabled.

idleDelay.Description: The amount of time a VM will idle before it is shutdown if this behavior is enabled.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the image.

provisioningState.Description: Current provisioning state of the image.

osType.Description: The OS Type of the image.

plan.Description: The ID of marketplace plan associated with the image (optional).

termsStatus.Description: The status of image terms of use (enabled = accepted, disabled = not accepted).

offer.Description: The ID of an offer associated with the image.

publisher.Description: The ID of the publisher of the image.

sharedGalleryId.Description: The ID for the image in the shared gallery.

availableRegions.Description: The available regions of the image in the shared gallery.

osState.Description: The OS State of the image.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the lab.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.Description: Current provisioning state of the lab.

networkProfile.Description: The network profile for the lab, typically applied via a lab plan. This profile cannot be modified once a lab has been created.

autoShutdownProfile.Description: The resource auto shutdown configuration for the lab. This controls whether actions are taken on resources that are sitting idle.

connectionProfile.Description: The connection profile for the lab. This controls settings such as web access to lab resources or whether RDP or SSH ports are open.

virtualMachineProfile.Description: The profile used for creating lab virtual machines.

rosterProfile.Description: The lab user list management profile.

labPlanId.Description: The ID of the lab plan. Used during resource creation to provide defaults and acts as a permission container when creating a lab via labs.azure.com. Setting a labPlanId on an existing lab provides organization..

loadBalancerId.Description: The external load balancer resource id

publicIpId.Description: The external public IP resource id

createOption.Description: Indicates what lab virtual machines are created from.

imageReference.Description: The image configuration for lab virtual machines.

osType.Description: The OS type of the image

sku.Description: The SKU for the lab. Defines the type of virtual machines used in the lab.

usageQuota.Description: The initial quota alloted to each lab user. Must be a time span between 0 and 9999 hours.

useSharedPassword.Description: Enabling this option will use the same password for all user VMs.

adminUser.Description: Credentials for the admin user on the VM.

nonAdminUser.Description: Credentials for the non-admin user on the VM, if one exists.

version.Description: The image version specified on creation.

exactVersion.Description: The actual version of the image after use.

name.Description: The name of the SKU. Ex - P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.Description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.Description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.Description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.Description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

installGpuDrivers.Description: Flag to pre-install dedicated GPU drivers.

username.Description: The username to use when signing in to lab VMs.

password.Description: The password for the user. This is required for the TemplateVM createOption.

registrationCode.Description: The registration code for the lab.

openAccess.Description: Whether any user or only specified users can register to a lab.

activeDirectoryGroupId.Description: The AAD group ID which this lab roster is populated from. Having this set enables AAD sync mode.

ltiContextId.Description: The unique context identifier for the lab in the lms.

lmsInstance.Description: The base URI identifying the lms instance.

ltiClientId.Description: The unique id of the azure lab services tool in the lms.

ltiRosterEndpoint.Description: The uri of the names and roles service endpoint on the lms for the class attached to this lab.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the user resource.

provisioningState.Description: Current provisioning state of the user resource.

displayName.Description: Display name of the user, for example user's full name.

registrationState.Description: State of the user's registration within the lab.

invitationState.Description: State of the invitation message for the user.

invitationSent.Description: Date and time when the invitation message was sent to the user.

totalUsage.Description: How long the user has used their virtual machines in this lab.

additionalUsageQuota.Description: The amount of usage quota time the user gets in addition to the lab usage quota.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the schedule.

provisioningState.Description: Current provisioning state of the schedule.

startAt.Description: When lab user virtual machines will be started. Timestamp offsets will be ignored and timeZoneId is used instead.

stopAt.Description: When lab user virtual machines will be stopped. Timestamp offsets will be ignored and timeZoneId is used instead.

recurrencePattern.Description: The recurrence pattern of the scheduled actions.

timeZoneId.Description: The IANA timezone id for the schedule.

weekDays.Description: The week days the schedule runs. Used for when the Frequency is set to Weekly.

interval.Description: The interval to invoke the schedule on. For example, interval = 2 and RecurrenceFrequency.Daily will run every 2 days. When no interval is supplied, an interval of 1 is used.

expirationDate.Description: When the recurrence will expire. This date is inclusive.
